TravelTriangle > Blog > Abu Dhabi > 7 Best Abu Dhabi Beaches That Are Perfect For Soothing Your Mind, Body & Soul 7 Best Abu Dhabi Beaches That Are Perfect For Soothing Your Mind, Body & Soul .. SHARES Updated Date: 11 May 2023 Apart from the iconic Sheikh Zayed Mosque and the famous Ferrari World, Abu Dhabi has also got some of the most mesmerizing beaches in the UAE. From a private beach near your hotel to public beaches in the city, there are various places to pick from for relaxing with your loved ones. So, there’s no doubt that there are all kinds of Abu Dhabi beaches to soothe your mood, mind & soul. You can enjoy yourself at these hot spots for hours or just soak in a little luxury and beat the heat in UAE like never before! Table Of Content 7 Best Beaches In Abu Dhabi For An Extraordinary Experience While the capital of UAE is not really a beach city, there are still some serene places to relax and unwind with your loved ones. Take a look! Corniche Beach Yas Beach Saadiyat Beach Al Bateen Beach Al Sahil Beach Al Mirfa Beach Beach Rotana 1. Corniche Beach The Corniche Beach in Abu Dhabi is a tranquil and beautiful place with all the amenities and sanitary facilities available. It’s also one of the cleanest Abu Dhabi beaches with has some kick-ass food options nearby. The lifeguards are always present here. Apart from relaxing here, you can also spot a few jellyfishes. Timings: 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM Location: Corniche Corniche Rd, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates Dubai Holiday Packages On TravelTriangle Travel Dubai in Luxury. Visit grand Burj Khalifa or the breathtaking Palm Islands. Enjoy Dhow Cruise, International Buffet Dinner, Dubai City Tour, Desert Safari, Ferrari World and Abu Dhabi City Tour. Book Now See more at TRAVELTRIANGLE.COM Visit Website 2. Yas Beach Suggested Read: 10 Resorts In Abu Dhabi To Soak In The Extravagance Of The Arab The Yas Beach in Abu Dhabi has an amazing walking area along the beach where you can have the best moments of leisure. No doubt, it is one of the top beaches in Abu Dhabi where you can rejuvenate yourself. This is also the best place for getting your children along as there are many activities they can do here. Apart from this, there are numerous food joints where you can enjoy delicious food. Timings: 10:00 AM – 7:00 PM Location: Yas Island, Opp Crown Plaza – Abu Dhabi – United Arab Emirates 3. Saadiyat Beach Saadiyat Beach in Abu Dhabi has a beautiful cover of white sands over it. The beach has a number of sunbeds and a cafeteria, which offers decently priced quality food. The Saadiyat Public Beach, Abu Dhabi is also the only unaltered beach in the UAE. So, if you’re looking for a place to unwind with your family, search no further. Timings: 8:00 AM – 6:15 PM Location: Saadiyat Island – Abu Dhabi – United Arab Emirates Suggested Read: 31 Places To Visit In Abu Dhabi For Those Who Want Everything From One City 4. Al Bateen Beach Suggested Read: The World’s Largest ‘Warner Bros. World Abu Dhabi’ Theme Park To Open This July! Al Bateen Beach in Abu Dhabi is one of the best beaches in the city. It is an excellent place to plan for a family outing and it also has a specific beach for women. Of all the things to do here, you can play football or volleyball, indulge in swimming and also taste the local food. Timings: 8:00 AM – 7:00 PM Location: Khaleej Al Arabi Street, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates 5. Al Sahil Beach Suggested Read: Delve Into The Abu Dhabi Nightlife & Let The Party Begin The Al Sahil Beach in Abu Dhabi is a very serene and surreal place. You can visit it with both your family and friends. The view here is also breathtaking with the tall buildings on one side and the deep sea on another. If you’re planning to visit here, there’s nothing you’d have to worry about as it offers the best amenities in the city. Timings: NA Location: Al Sahil Beach, Corniche Abu Dhabi – Corniche Rd – Abu Dhabi – United Arab Emirates 6. Al Mirfa Beach Suggested Read: 10 Indian Restaurants In Abu Dhabi For A Sumptuous Culinary Delight Mirfa Beach is the place where the Al Gharbia Watersports Festival is hosted. The beach is not very crowded and has a town nearby where you can go and shop for anything you desire. It also offers activities like Kiteboarding, Wakeboarding, surf ski, and kayaking. So, if you’re looking for some real adventure, make sure you head straight to this place. Timings: Open for 24 hours Location: Al Gharbia – Abu Dhabi – United Arab Emirates 7. Beach Rotana Suggested Read: 10 Things To Do In Abu Dhabi Unveiling The Best Of Arab Emirates Beach Rotana is one of the leading hotels of the world that offers the best private beaches in Abu Dhabi. It has fantastic rooms with amazing views, the food is drool-worthy and the staff is very amicable and attending. The pools here are excellent and the Abu Dhabi Mall is also located near the beach. Timings: NA Location: 10th Street, Al Zahiya Area – Abu Dhabi – United Arab Emirates Abu Dhabi has a string of beaches, and all of them are picturesque and magnificent. So, if you’re planning a trip to Dubai anytime soon, make sure you visit Abu Dhabi too and escape the summer sun by spending time at one of these places. Looking To Book An International Holiday?
